Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.connectors

Class PingPongTwoWayConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractTwoWayConnector<PingPongTwoWayCI>
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.connectors.PingPongTwoWayConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, PingPongTwoWayCI, ComponentInterface, OfferedCI, RequiredCI, TwoWayCI, java.rmi.Remote
    public class PingPongTwoWayConnector
extends AbstractTwoWayConnector<PingPongTwoWayCI>
implements PingPongTwoWayCI
    The class PingPongTwoWayConnector implements the two way connector for the PingPongI interface.

    Description

    Note how the URI of the two connected ports are used in conjunction with the URI provided by the call argument to identify which way the call must go.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-03-14

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
